title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2169/92 of 30 July 1992 fixing the storage aid for unprocessed dried grapes from the 1991/92 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2169/92  of 30 July 1992  fixing the storage aid for unprocessed dried grapes from the 1991/92 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The storage aid referred to in Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 627/85 shall, for dried grapes from the 1991/92 marketing year, be as set out in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 July 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 49, 27. 2. 1986, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 166, 20. 6. 1992, p. 5. (3) OJ No L 72, 13. 3. 1985, p. 17. (4) OJ No L 350, 14. 12. 1990, p. 56.
ANNEX
STORAGE AID FOR UNPROCESSED DRIED GRAPES FROM THE 1991/92 MARKETING YEAR
DRIED GRAPES
(ECU per day per 100 kilograms net)
Until the end of February 1993  From 1 March 1993      Sultanas of category 4  0,0327  0,0083
